timeline.title: Technical Consultant
timeline.description: Driving discussions for requirement analysis, technical feasibility checks, and actively involve in designing and implementing solutions to meet the demands of new SAP enhancement requests.

timeline.title: Associate
timeline.description: Designing & Developing Enterprise Solutions using a combination of SAP Technologies and Platforms. Collaborating with Functional & Business Analysts to gather requirements, fixing bugs, and validating solutions against the business requirements.

timeline.title: Project Intern
timeline.description: During my Internship, I worked with Senior Engineers focusing on a project centered around Full Stack Web Application Development. I have developed custom UI5 frontend components and explored ways to visualize data at the web interface using OData APIs & JavaScript.
